title: Boards pls
body:
Boards keeps randomly changing region to NA... while still only showing OCE posts.

Is there a way to lock it to OCE or something it's super annoying.

replies.body: Aaaaaaaaaand after reading *one* of my updates allllllllllllll of my updates were cleared...
If you click "All" to the left of unread, they show all your updates with the newest closer to the top.

> If you click "All" to the left of unread, they show all your updates with the newest closer to the top.

Ah! Good, thank you, I didn't even notice that.

So it's just the region thing that needs fixing then.
Yeah both of these issues frustrate me as well. As of yet I don't know how to fix them, probably just beta bugs. Hopefully they get fixed in the future.
